book_crud_service.rest.api package¶

Submodules¶

book_crud_service.rest.api.book_controller module¶

async book_crud_service.rest.api.book_controller.create_book(book: BookCreateModel, session: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db))[source]¶

API endpoint to create a new book. - book: The Pydantic model (BookCreateModel) containing book details. - session: Database session, automatically injected via FastAPI’s dependency injection.

async book_crud_service.rest.api.book_controller.delete_book(id: int, session: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db))[source]¶

API endpoint to delete a book by its ID. - id: The ID of the book to delete. - session: Database session.

async book_crud_service.rest.api.book_controller.get_all_books(session: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db))[source]¶

API endpoint to retrieve all books. - session: Database session.

async book_crud_service.rest.api.book_controller.get_book_by_id(id: int, session: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db))[source]¶

API endpoint to get a book by its ID. - id: The ID of the book to retrieve. - session: Database session.

async book_crud_service.rest.api.book_controller.patch_book(id: int, book_data: BookPatchModel, session: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db))[source]¶

API endpoint to partially update a book. - id: The ID of the book to patch. - book_data: The Pydantic model (BookPatchModel) containing fields to be updated. - session: Database session.

async book_crud_service.rest.api.book_controller.test_request()[source]¶

A simple test endpoint.

async book_crud_service.rest.api.book_controller.update_book(id: int, book_data: BookUpdateModel, session: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db))[source]¶

API endpoint to fully update a book. - id: The ID of the book to update. - book_data: The Pydantic model (BookUpdateModel) containing updated book details. - session: Database session.

book_crud_service.rest.api.common_error module¶

book_crud_service.rest.api.common_error.common_error_responses()[source]¶

book_crud_service.rest.api.review_controller module¶

async book_crud_service.rest.api.review_controller.create_review(book_id: int, review: ReviewCreateModel, session: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db))[source]¶

API endpoint to create a new review for a book. - book_id: The ID of the book for which the review is being created. - review: The Pydantic model (ReviewCreateModel) containing review details. - session: Database session, automatically injected via FastAPI’s dependency injection.

async book_crud_service.rest.api.review_controller.delete_review(review_id: int, session: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db))[source]¶
async book_crud_service.rest.api.review_controller.get_all_reviews(book_id: int, session: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db))[source]¶
async book_crud_service.rest.api.review_controller.update_review(review_id: int, review_data: ReviewUpdateModel, session: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db))[source]¶
